resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108328</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108328</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085875</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">It's an ad!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Es ist eine Anzeige!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une annonce !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">É um anúncio!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">È un annuncio!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Είναι μια αγγελία!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Es un anuncio!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">How do marketers target kids -- and how can we teach kids to know the difference between advertising and fact? These websites provide strategies to build critical thinking skills for media literate kids.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie zielen Marketingspezialisten Zicklein -- und wie 
können wir Zicklein unterrichten, den Unterschied zwischen dem 
Bekanntmachen und Tatsache zu kennen? Diese Web site liefern 
Strategien, um kritische denkende Fähigkeiten für gebildete Zicklein
der Media aufzubauen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment les acheteurs visent-ils des gosses -- et comment 
pouvons-nous enseigner des gosses à savoir la différence entre la 
publicité et le fait ? Ces sites Web fournissent des 
stratégies pour établir des qualifications de pensée critiques pour
les gosses instruits de medias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como os comerciantes alvejam miúdos -- e como podemos 
nós ensinar miúdos saber a diferença entre anunciar e fato? 
Estes Web site fornecem estratégias para construir habilidades 
pensando críticas para miúdos literate dos media.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come i marketers designano i capretti come bersaglio -- e 
come possiamo insegnare i capretti conoscere la differenza fra la 
pubblicità ed il fatto? Questi Web site forniscono le strategie
per sviluppare le abilità pensanti critiche per i capretti literate 
di media.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς οι έμποροι στοχεύουν στα κατσίκια -- και πώς 
μπορούμε να διδάξουμε τα κατσίκια για να ξέρουμε τη διαφορά 
μεταξύ της διαφήμισης και του γεγονότος; Αυτοί οι ιστοχώροι
παρέχουν τις στρατηγικές για να χτίσουν τις κρίσιμες δεξιότητες 
σκέψης για τα εγγράμματα κατσίκια μέσων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cómo los vendedores apuntan a cabritos -- y cómo 
podemos enseñar a cabritos a saber la diferencia entre la publicidad 
y el hecho? Estos Web site proporcionan a estrategias para 
construir las habilidades de pensamiento críticas para los cabritos 
que sabe leer y escribir de los media.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MELISSA THIBAULT
FN:MELISSA THIBAULT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085875</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108328</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/its-an-ad</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
